price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: ”Nokorε sε me Wura Nyankopͻn sane Nokorε no (anaasε Adiyisεm no). (Ɔne) Nsumaeε mu Nimdefoͻ no“.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
